publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2253 Alex Neil: Vulnerable Adults Bill—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to introduce its proposed Vulnerable Adults Bill as soon as possible.
S2M-2253 Alex Neil: Vulnerable Adults Bill—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to introduce its proposed Vulnerable Adults Bill as soon as possible.
S2M-2253 Vulnerable Adults Bill (lodged on 13 January 2005) Michael Matheson*
